attributes.action: Fair trade and fair price for all supermarkets and convenience stores
attributes.additional_details: Government should get involved to support small shops big stores should not put cheap prices than the small shops pay
attributes.background:
Decide the same price for superstores and small shops 
Big stores are selling smrinoff 2 for £20
Small shops pay £11.20 cheapest 
How are small shops meant to survive

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Setting prices for individual products is a matter for retailers.

The Government has already introduced minimum pricing for alcohol products. If you would like these to be increased so retailers cannot sell below cost price, you could start a new petition calling for that to happen.
